details:
noun
- the act of killing
= example: the act of killing
- the event of dying or departure from life
= example: the event of dying or departure from life
= synonyms: decease, expiry
- the permanent end of all life functions in an organism or part of an organism
= example: the permanent end of all life functions in an organism or part of an organism
- the absence of life or state of being dead
= example: the absence of life or state of being dead
- a final state
= synonyms: destruction
- the time at which life ends
= synonyms: last
- the time when something ends
= example: the time when something ends
= synonyms: dying, demise
